description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
name: Shadowshift
